title: Cam Jordan on Saints-Falcons, Brett Favre scandal, Drew Brees' change of heart
itunes:title: Cam Jordan on Saints-Falcons, Brett Favre scandal, Drew Brees' change of heart
description:
New Orleans Saints defensive end Cameron Jordan joins Mike Silver to discuss the Falcons not taking Jordan in the 2011 Draft, plus Atlanta's recent tendency to allow big comebacks, his love for quarterback Jameis Winston, how team culture has changed under head coach Dennis Allen, why Drew Brees changed his stance towards kneeling during the National Anthem, and the Denver Broncos' questionable decision to attempt a potential game-winning 64-yard field goal last week against the Seattle Seahawks. #volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
